medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports being awoken from sleep with acute onset right lower quadrant pain that was initially throughout the abdomen and subsequently localized to the right lower quadrant. She reports some nausea and denies appetite. Symptoms include return of abdominal pain, nausea, and anorexia. Fevers and chills were experienced prior to current admission. Anorexia noted during recent acute episode.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of c-section delivery; current pregnancy at 16 weeks.
